detail_desc: Blouse in a softly draping jacquard weave with a slight sheen. Frilled stand-up collar and long puff sleeves with frill-trimmed, buttoned cuffs. Concealed button at the back of the neck and a concealed zip at the back.
Jersey top with a slightly wider neckline and long dolman sleeves.
Jersey top with a slightly wider neckline and long dolman sleeves.
Long, three-strand necklace of thin metal chains in various designs, one with a coin-shaped pendant and another with a faceted plastic stone. Adjustable length 68-76 cm.
Metal and plastic earrings in various designs. Length 3 cm and 4 cm.

Short dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, a tie belt at the waist and a pleated skirt. Partly lined.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.
Fitted jumper in a soft, rib knit with a turtle neck, visible zip at the top and long sleeves.
Fitted jumper in a soft, rib knit with a turtle neck, visible zip at the top and long sleeves.

Warm-lined boots in waterproof functional fabric with imitation leather details and a padded shaft with a faux fur trim. Adjustable elasticated lacing at the front, a zip in one side and reflective details. Pile linings and insoles.

Warm-lined boots in waterproof functional fabric with imitation leather details and a padded shaft with a faux fur trim. Adjustable elasticated lacing at the front, a zip in one side and reflective details. Pile linings and insoles.

Warm-lined boots in waterproof functional fabric with imitation leather details, an elastic drawstring at the top of the shaft and reflective details. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles. The boots have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Warm-lined boots in waterproof functional fabric with imitation leather details, an elastic drawstring at the top of the shaft and reflective details. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles. The boots have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Set with a strappy top, top and pair of leggings in soft cotton jersey. Strappy top with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps. Top with short sleeves. Both with gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy. Leggings with a wide waist panel.
